content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I appreciate

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Good puzzle based off the real world. Not too easy but not too hard.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Simple and fun clash :)

Goal / Stub generator
* The variable name is inconsistent: "s" is used in the Goal section, while "h" is used in the stub generator. Please standardise and use the same name.

* Please format "Lucky!", "Great!", "Just OK" and "Bummer" as {{constants}}.

* Please add a full-stop at the end of the Goal section.

* Please add a write statement (e.g. write answer) in the stub generator.

Output
* Please format "Lucky!", "Great!", "Just OK" and "Bummer" as {{constants}}.

Cases
* Test 2: The input contains "1", but the Goal and Input sections specify that inputs should consist of digits from 2 to 9 only. Please correct the input.

* In Tests 1, 2 and 3, the same digits always appear together, but in the validators, some of the same digits are separated. Please revise these tests so that they align with the validator patterns.

Thanks.

Thank you for the clear feedback. I've fixed all points listed. I'm not sure exactly what you mean by adding a full-stop at the end of  the Goal section. I added a missing period, but if there's something else that needs included to end the statement please let me know.

Thanks!

Yes, that's what I meant. The contribution looks ok now. Thanks.

Reverse mode might be a bit too difficult, but it's up to you whether to wait for more feedback before disabling it.
That was my original thought, as well, but one of my students thought it could be fun. I'm going to disable it for now.
